author: janb
msg: New web access log functionality added, but commented out awaiting a new Jetty snapshot jar to make it work.

author: janb
msg: 1. changed ReadOnlyContext to javax.naming.Context in interface method signatures to improve pluggability
2. webapp deploy goal was removed twice from list of goals
3. fixed up formatting of several classes and added some comments
4. add new web access log functionality - just waiting for new Jetty snapshot jar to enable it
5. implemented JSR77 method getDeploymentDescriptor for web applications. Temporary solution only.

author: janb
msg: Don't attempt to call getAttribute unless there is a getter for it (ie it is Readable). There is not always going to be a getter for every setter.

author: djencks
msg: Another egregious bug: release connections at end of tx if they have no more handles

msg: Fixing the tests in the test suite.
